mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM (name, description, price, unit, volume, length, package_type, origin, expiration, price_per_100g, allergic_info, model_serial_no, rating, search_keyword, stock, discount_price, oneday_eligible, fresh_eligible) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{unit}, #{volume}, #{length}, #{packageType}, #{origin}, #{expiration}, #{pricePer100g}, #{allergicInfo}, #{modelSerialNo}, #{rating}, #{searchKeyword}, #{stock}, #{discountPrice}, #{onedayEligible}, #{freshEligible})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, price, unit, volume, length, package_type, origin, expiration, price_per_100g, allergic_info, model_serial_no, rating, search_keyword, stock, discount_price, oneday_eligible, fresh_eligible FROM ITEM WHERE id = #{id}
